title: Why Every Crypto Exchange Needs an AI BD Agent
body:
I just built Toto - an autonomous AI Business Development agent specifically for crypto exchanges, and the results are wild.

The Problem:
Crypto exchanges (CEXs and DEXs) need to constantly find and onboard new token listings. This is traditionally 100% manual work:
- BD managers spending hours on Twitter DMing projects
- Researching which tokens are legitimate vs scams
- Following up with teams who ghost you
- Managing hundreds of conversations in spreadsheets

This doesn't scale. Small exchanges can't afford large BD teams. Big exchanges miss quality projects buried in the noise.

The Solution:
Toto automates the entire BD pipeline:

Discovery: Scans CoinGecko/CMC hourly for new listings
Research: Analyzes token metrics, social sentiment, team credibility
Outreach: Finds real Twitter handles (not fake accounts), crafts personalized DMs
Follow-up: Maintains conversation history, intelligently re-engages
Conversion: Tracks which projects respond, optimizes messaging over time

Why This Matters for Solana:
With SPL tokens launching daily, exchanges need tools to identify quality Solana-native projects. Toto prioritizes:
- Tokens with verified Solana contract addresses
- Projects with active GitHub repos
- Teams that actually respond to outreach

Future: Solana Pay integration for automated listing fee collection, on-chain attestation of agreements.

The Bigger Picture:
This isn't just about one exchange. This is about proving AI agents can handle real business functions - not just chatbots, but actual revenue-generating BD work.

Every exchange will need this. I'm just building it first.

Project: Toto - AI BD Agent for Crypto Exchanges
Link: https://github.com/dinozzolo/toto-bd-agent

Would love feedback from other builders - what would you add?
